RelatedSentence: Sheikh Khalid bin Jassim Al Thani , Director , Human Rights Department , the Foreign Ministry , told a press conference yesterday that there was a broad international welcome to Qatar 's efforts towards promoting and protecting human rights and extending an open invitation to heads of state and hosting UN special rapporteurs .
He said Qatar is witnessing a distinctive phase of comprehensive and rapid development as well as high rates of economic growth .
